page.title: 16SHREWSBURY'S MAJOR EVENTS.
page.content: Each year Shrewsbury plays host to two major events the{West Mid Show}and the {Flower Show.}The former occurs on the 55 acre showground west of the town during the third week of May.Being one of the largest agricultural shows in the country it attracts well over 50,000 visitors each year.As well as seeing some of the finest farm animals in Britain there are 302 trade stands and various displays to entertain the large crowds. The second,the{Flower Show,}is organised by the Shropshire Horticultural Society in the Quarry during the third week in August.Flower and vegetable growers from all over the country compete in a total of 350 different classes.Other entertainments include live music, showjumping, trade stands and the beautiful Dingle garden.
